name: MAIN INPUTS
group API call
shared IDs
INPUTS
revisions API
func:
msg.payload = "https://api1.www.3drepo.io/api/" + flow.get("teamspace") + "/" + flow.get("modelID") + "/" + "revisions.json?key=" + flow.get("key");

return msg;

name: OUTPUTS
revisions
info:
get all revisions of a model

to choose only subset of revisions use:
msg.payload.slice(0,3)

place after login

name: ID map call
how to
info:
log in at http://localhost:1880/ui/#/0 or http://yourVPS:1880/ui/#/0
set your teamspace and model ID of Lego_House_Federation in MAIN INPUTS
set path to validate.csv in read csv, make sure spreadsheet cells are formatted as text
deploy
change options for broad/narrow validation or value check in data validation INPUTS
open Lego_House_Federation in 3D Repo, see the results in Issues card
